name: Wing Cap Mario
description: The legendary plumber hovers gracefully in his Wing Cap, observing the shifting wind patterns around the floating platforms.

dialogue.greeting: Isaac! It's-a me, Mario! The sky is-a calling, and the stars are dancing with the wind!

topics.about_flying: If you can see the path the wind makes in the clouds, you'll find your way up here.
topics.about_heights: There's a certain harmony in the skies, Isaac. The Power Star can help you tune in to it!
